project.name: Slovenia Address Import (GURS)
project.description: Describes tags used in the Slovenia Address Import project.

tags.description: House number, with lowercase suffixes
Street name (both names in bilingual regions, separated by '/')
Slovenian-only street name (only in bilingual regions)
Italian street name (only in bilingual South-West part of Slovenia)
Hungarian street name (only in bilingual North-East part of Slovenia)
Place name (both names in bilingual regions, separated by '/')
Slovenian-only place name (only in bilingual regions)
Italian place name (only in bilingual South-West part of Slovenia)
Hungarian place name (only in bilingual North-East part of Slovenia)
Place name (both names in bilingual regions, separated by '/')
Slovenian-only place name (only in bilingual regions)
Italian place name (only in bilingual South-West part of Slovenia)
Hungarian place name (only in bilingual North-East part of Slovenia)
4-digit Slovenian post code
Postal area name (both names in bilingual regions, separated by '/')
Slovenian-only postal area name (only in bilingual regions)
Italian postal area name (only in bilingual South-West part of Slovenia)
Hungarian postal area name (only in bilingual North-East part of Slovenia)
The address was obtained from The Surveying and Mapping Authority of Republic of Slovenia (GURS)
The geometry was obtained from The Surveying and Mapping Authority of Republic of Slovenia (GURS)
Date of validity in GURS source database
Preserving numeric address id from GURS source database for future updates
Preserving numeric building id from GURS source database for future updates
